definition: grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately

sentences.english: Still, Japan quickly suspended imports of American long-grain rice.
sentences.chinese: 日本立即做出反應，暫緩對美國長粒大米的進口。

sentences.english: In this paper, the preparation technology for Spirulina colour- pearled drink was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對螺旋藻珍珠粒飲料的製作技術進行了較深入地研究。

sentences.english: The eui mutation also resulted in significant increase in flag leaf and grain length.
sentences.chinese: 該突變還引起了劍葉和粒長髮生顯著變化。

sentences.english: It was Fabiano's third goal at this World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 這也是法比亞諾在本屆世界盃的第3粒入球。

sentences.english: Most chromomeres contain a genetic unit.
sentences.chinese: 絕大多數染色粒包含一個遺傳單位。

sentences.english: Timed-release caplets provide a gradual release of vital nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 定時釋放粒提供了一個逐步釋放的重要營養素。

sentences.english: or Raman reporter molecule immobilized metallic nanoparticles.
sentences.chinese: 拉曼，報導了固定化的分子金屬納米粒。

sentences.english: The starch granules of Lycoris longituba had no significant difference.
sentences.chinese: 並且統計不同部位澱粉粒的數目和大小。

sentences.english: A female stinkbug lays 300 to 400 eggs at a time, and dies after the eggs are laid.
sentences.chinese: 一隻雌蠋蝽每次產卵三百至四百粒，產後便死去。

sentences.english: This mier is applicable to mixing of the color plastic material in granular form, fodder, foods and other material.
sentences.chinese: 適用於塑膠粒色粉，新舊混合，飼料食品機其它用途。

sentences.english: Starch grains present in the embryo sac and placenta are utilized by the embryo.
sentences.chinese: 存在於胚囊和胎座中的澱粉粒爲胚所利用。

sentences.english: Last night I took a painkiller so I had a good sleep.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚吃了粒“芬必得”才得有一夜好覺。

sentences.english: Take 2 caplets per day near mealtime.
These are 100 seeds in the packet.
Between the second button and the third button of the shirt.
sentences.chinese: 夾在襯衫的第二和第三粒鈕釦之間。

sentences.english: The polarity distributions of starch grains and aleurone were extremely evident in the early stage of globular embryo.
sentences.chinese: 球胚形成前期，澱粉粒和糊粉粒極性分佈已很明顯。

definition: spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
